Miguel Moreno

University Researcher, Department of Mathematics and Statistics, University of Helsinki .

  • Applications of Mathematics
  • Pure Mathematics
  • Popular Science
  • Events and Links
  • Contact

I am doctor in mathematics, currently a university researcher at the Department of Mathematics and Statistics of the University of Helsinki.

My research is focus on Mathematical Logic, set theory and model theory. I am also interested in different applications of mathematics, and popular science.


On the top you can find the navigation bar of sections, and in each section page the navigation bar of subsections is on the left.

  •    Most recent preprint:   Shelah's Main Gap and the generalized Borel-reducibility. arXiv - DOI: 10.48550/arXiv.2308.07510

  •    Most recent article:   On unsuperstable theories in GDST. Journal of Symbolic Logic - DOI: 10.1017/jsl.2023.82

  •    Most recent presentation:   The Borel reducibility Main Gap. Slides - Event: European Set Theory Conference.
